name: Grapefruit Sorbet
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, low-fat, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, dessert, grapefruit juice, vermouth, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups fresh squeezed pink grapefruit juice, strained, chilled

recipeInstructions.text: Put the water in a saucepan. Add the sugar. Bring to a boil. Lower the heat and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring until the sugar has dissolved. Refrigerate until chilled.
Combine the sugar mixture, grapefruit juice and vermouth in a bowl. Pour it into a sorbet machine and proceed as directed.
